snippet: Researchers used isotope analysis to help the police pin down the timeline and background of a murder victim in a 41-year-old cold case in Florida.
abstract: Florida detectives, working with forensic experts at the University of South Florida's Tampa Bay Cold Case Project, use isotope analysis, process of analyzing chemical traces in physical evidence, and other modern techniques to uncover the background of a murder victim known as Jane Doe in 41-year-old cold case.
lead_paragraph: Researchers used isotope analysis to help the police pin down the timeline and background of a murder victim in a 41-year-old cold case in Florida.

headline.seo: Isotope Analysis Provides Clues in a Florida Cold Case
headline.main: A Jane Doe Gets a Back Story
headline.print_headline: A Jane Doe Gets a Back Story
